subject: docs: add commit convention guide and validation hooks
body:
D2 deliverable - Commit Convention Guide:
- docs/COMMIT_CONVENTION.md: Full guide for conventional commits
  with type definitions, examples, and analytics impact
- .gitmessage: Git commit template for consistent formatting
- hooks/commit-msg: Validation hook for commit message format
- hooks/setup.sh: Installation script for git hooks

Run ./hooks/setup.sh to enable validation.
